Module.Name: Exposure biomarker conversions
Module.Description: Occasionally, the biomarker of interest (substance) is not measured. Exposure biomarker conversions specify how measured biomarkers are converted to the relevant biomarkers (substances). This type of conversion is within biological matrices.
Module.ShortDescription: Specifies the conversion from substances to relevant biomarkers within a biological matrix.
Module.DataDescription: Exposure biomarkers conversions are provided as data in the form of a conversion factor for a substances (from) and substance (to).
